code: import React from'react';import{Carousel}from'react-responsive-carousel';import'react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css';import"../styles/Carousel.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCarousel=_ref=>{let{projects}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{className:"project-carousel",showThumbs:false,showStatus:false,infiniteLoop:true,autoPlay:true,children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px',textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"projectName",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),project.github&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.github,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{padding:'10px',backgroundColor:'#007bff',color:'#fff',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px'},children:"Voir sur GitHub"})})]},index))});};export default ProjectCarousel;
